original_text:
If indeed you would exalt yourselves above me
    and use my humiliation against me,
korean_text: 너희가 참으로 나를 향하여 자만하며 내게 수치스러운 행위가 있다고 증언하려면 하려니와

sentences.original_text: If indeed you would exalt yourselves above me
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 정말로 너희가 나보다 자신을 높이려 한다면

sentences.original_text: and use my humiliation against me
